item.description:
Location has been changed to the end floor of Roots and Wings - NEST

Specific Topic:  NLP techniques for Excellence

This is intended to be a pretty open agenda, taking suggestions from participants.  Things we will cover that help people find and use internal resources of excellence are anchors, physiology, modeling and so forth.  These will be discussed and techniques will be demo'd.

Come learn, have fun, and experience a change for the better!

 

Come Learn and Play!!

Our Monthly Hypnosis/NLP Meetup in Methuen. Learn/Experience/Share techniques and strategies to help yourself or others overcome fears, phobias, negative emotions, illnesses, and many others, as well as to become the person you always wanted to be.

Kevin Martin

978-273-5905
kenda_assoc@msn.com
www.poseffects.com

group.name: The Greater Boston NLP and Hypnosis Meetup Group

item.name: The Greater Boston NLP Meetup - Natick - NLP techniques for Excellence
